A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
WHAT I LIKED:
- good visuals
- great music
- the scene with the red guards
- Benicio Del Toro (minor) role

WHAT I DIDN'T LIKE:
- what they did to Luke
- Mary Poppins/Peter Pan Leia
- Rose
- Canto bight scene
- sea cow milk
- Yoda burning books
- Rey is an instant Jedi
- terrible humor
- Chewbacca underused
- Luke's death
- Useless scenes
- Snoke - no backstory
- Rey's parentage
- Snoke's death scene
- shirtless Kylo Ren (why?)
- Poe becomes a useless hothead
- Finn goes on a pointless mission
- terrible dialogue
- some pretty bad acting
- questionable casting
- PREACHY AS HELL

Too bad because this movie could have been awesome.
